titleStmt.title: P.Zauzich
Res severa verum gaudium. Festschrift fur Karl-Theodore Zauzich zum 65. Gerburstag am 8. Juni 2004
Machine readable text

div1.p:
[*pra=sis kai\ a)postasi/ou *(eri/ews newte/rou *satabou=tos kai\ *qenapu/gxews th=s gunaiko\s] a?u)tou= pro\s *yenamou=nin u[i(]o\[n] *paou=t?os

[#71 *(erieu=s new/teros ][*sata]bou=tos [sata]b?ous mhtro\s *qah/sios qahsis kai\ h( gunh/ mo?u? *q?e?napu=gxi?s th=s *pane-
[fre/mmews mhtro\s ][*tane]fre/mmios [tane]fremmis o(mologou=men peprake/na?i? *y?enamou=ni *paou=tos
[mhtro\s *tapetesou/xo]u th\n u(pa/rxousan tw=| *(e[r]ieu/ti oi)ki/an di/stegon kai\ au)lh\n to e[r]i?eus oikias d?i<s>thkou k?a?i aulhs
[e)k tou= pro\s borra= me/ro]u?s kai\ ta\ sugku/ronta pa/nta ton sunkuronton panton [e)]n? t?h=| *s?okn?[o]pai/ou *nh/sw| nhiou
[th=s *(hraklei/dou ][mer]i/dos [mer]itos w(=n gei/tones gitonos: *no/tou *(erieu=tos *sa[t]abou/tos to/poi w(=n eri?eusto sa?[t]a?b?o?us? topoi h e)pikra/-
[tei ta\ te/kna, *borra= ][ei)/]sodos kai\ e)/codo[s] ko[i]nh/ [ei]sotos kai ekcoto[s] go?[i]n?h, *libo\s *qash=tos kai\ *(erieu=tos oi)ki/a qashs? k?ai er?i?<e>us oikias h(=s e)pi-
[kra/tei ta\ te/kna, *)ap]h?liw/tou *st[o]toh/tios tou= *satabou=tos oi)ki/a k[ai\] au)lh/ st?[o]tohtis to?u? s?a?t?a?b?ous oiki?a?s? k?[ai] a?u?lh?s kai\ a)pe/xo-
[men th\n sugkexwrh]m?e/nhn timh\n pa/s{i}an? e)k plh/r?o?u?s{i} kai\ bebaiw/somen pa/sh| bebe?o?so<men> pasi be-
[baiw/sei e)pi\ to\n a(/]p?anta xro/non kaqw\s pro/keitai prokitai. e)/grayen u(pe\r au)tw=n auton *zw/i-
[los *leoni/dou di]a\? to\ mh\ ei)de/nai au)tou\?s?{i} gra/mmata, a)lla\ *(erieu=s bradu/teron plat?u?t?erou
[gra/fei *(erieus ][*sa]tabou=tos e)pite/taxa gra/fein [sa]tabous epid?etaka grafi. *yenamou=nis
[*paou=tos mhtro\s] *tapetesou/xou h)?g?o/?r?aka kaqw\s pro/keitai prokitai. e)/grayen u(pe\r au)tou=
[*(/hrwn *(ermi/ou d]ia\ to\ mh\ ei)de/na[i] au)to\n gra/mmata. pra=sis kai\ a)p?[o]stasi/ou
[oi)ki/as diste/gou kai\] tw=n sugkuro/ntwn sunkurwntwn pa/ntwn e)n th=i *sokn?o?p?a?i/ou
[*nhsw=| th=s *(hraklei/d]ou meri/dos to?u= *)arsinoi/tou n?omou= w(=n gei/tones gitwnos: *no/<to>u *(eri/ews
[*satabou=tos to/poi] w(/n e)pikratei= hs epikrati ta\ te/kna, *bo?rra= ei)/sodos isod?o?s? kai\ e)/codos koinh/{i}, *libo\s
[*qash=tos kai\ *(erie/ws] o?i)ki/a h(=s e)pikratei= epikrati ta\ t?e/?k?na, *)ap?h?l?iw/?t?ou *stot?o?h/tios
[*satabou=tos oi)ki/a] kai\ a)pe/x[o]usin th\n sugkexwrh/menhn sunkexwr?h?m?enhn timh\n? k?a?i\ bebaiw=si bebewsi
[pa/sh| bebaiw/sei], h(\?n? poiou=ntai poieit?ai *(e?r?i?e?u=s new/teros ne?ot?e?r?os? *s?a?t?a?b?o?u=tos m?h?t?r?o\s? *qash=tos
[e)tw=n 4 ou)lh\ kamph=|], kai\? h( a?u)tou= gunh\{i} *qenapu=gxis *p?a?nefr?e/?mmews mhtro\s *t[a]nefre/mmios?
[e)tw=n 41 a)/shmos pro\s ][*ye]namou=nin [ye]namounis *p?aou=tos mhtro\s *t?apetesou/xou e)tw=n 40 a)/?s?h?mos. e)/gr?ayen *zw/ilos *leoni/dou e)tw=n 4?5? a)/shmos.
[e)nte/ta]ktai mhni\ *seb[as]tou= 17 d?i?a\ t?ou= e)n *ne?i/?lou [po/]lei [g]r?afei/ou.

gra/mmata. e)nte/takkai entetik mhni\ *sebastou= 17

fai\ *stotoh=t[i]s stotoht[i]os kai\ *tah=s[i]s kai\ *tesen?[ou=fis meta\ kuri/ou tou= progegramme/nou *sata-]

tai. *satabou=s e)/graya kai\ u(pe\r tw=n a)d[elfw=n] tais ad[elfais][ dia\ to\ mh\ ei)de/nai au)ta\s gra/mmata. *panefro/mmis]

dia\ to\ mh\ ei)de/nai idenai au)to\n gra/mmat[a] gramat[a].

*mexei\r 3. a)nage/graptai dia\ [tou= e)n *soknopai/ou *nh/sw| grafei/ou.]
